item.title: Impacts of Information Technology on Society in the new Century
item.description: INTRODUCTION In the past few decades there has been a revolution in computing and communications, and all indications are that technological progress and use of information technology will continue at a rapid pace. Accompanying and supporting the dramatic increases in the power and use of new information technologies has been the declining cost of communications as a result of both technological improvements and increased competition. According to Mooreâ€™s law the processing power of microchips is doubling every 18 months.
